body_html: Can you detail how you are creating your model, how you are constructing the model (what framework), the commands and programs you used to compact the model and freeze it. It seems what is happening is that a part of the training network is brought in. If all else fails, you could try to construct an inference only network (that uses the same variables so you can load your trained checkpoint in it).

body: Can you detail how you are creating your model, how you are constructing the model (what framework), the commands and programs you used to compact the model and freeze it. It seems what is happening is that a part of the training network is brought in. If all else fails, you could try to construct an inference only network (that uses the same variables so you can load your trained checkpoint in it).
